trans-unit.source: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files
trans-unit.target: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files

trans-unit.source: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the StorageFile.IsAvailable property.
trans-unit.target: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the StorageFile.IsAvailable property.

trans-unit.source: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files
trans-unit.target: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property.
trans-unit.target: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property.

trans-unit.source: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
trans-unit.target: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

trans-unit.source: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C# or Visual Basic, see [Call asynchronous APIs in C# or Visual Basic](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt187337).
trans-unit.target: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C# or Visual Basic, see [Call asynchronous APIs in C# or Visual Basic](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt187337).

trans-unit.source: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see [Asynchronous programming in C++](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt187334).
trans-unit.target: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see [Asynchronous programming in C++](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt187334).

trans-unit.source: Users are able to mark OneDrive files as either available-offline (default) or online-only.
trans-unit.target: Users are able to mark OneDrive files as either available-offline (default) or online-only.

trans-unit.source: This capability enables users to move large files (such as pictures and videos) to their OneDrive, mark them as online-only, and save disk space (the only thing kept locally is a metadata file).
trans-unit.target: This capability enables users to move large files (such as pictures and videos) to their OneDrive, mark them as online-only, and save disk space (the only thing kept locally is a metadata file).

trans-unit.source: [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx), is used to determine if a file is currently available.
trans-unit.target: [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx), is used to determine if a file is currently available.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the value of the **StorageFile.IsAvailable** property in various scenarios.
trans-unit.target: The following table shows the value of the **StorageFile.IsAvailable** property in various scenarios.

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to determine if a file is currently available.
trans-unit.target: The following steps illustrate how to determine if a file is currently available.

trans-unit.source: Declare a capability appropriate for the library you want to access.
trans-unit.target: Declare a capability appropriate for the library you want to access.

trans-unit.source: This namespace includes the types for managing files, folders, and application settings.
trans-unit.target: This namespace includes the types for managing files, folders, and application settings.

trans-unit.source: It also includes the needed [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) type.
trans-unit.target: It also includes the needed [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) type.

trans-unit.source: Acquire a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) object for the desired file(s).
trans-unit.target: Acquire a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) object for the desired file(s).

trans-unit.source: If you are enumerating a library, this step is usually accomplished by calling the [**StorageFolder.CreateFileQuery**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227252) method and then calling the resulting [**StorageFileQueryResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR208046) object's [**GetFilesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br227276.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: If you are enumerating a library, this step is usually accomplished by calling the [**StorageFolder.CreateFileQuery**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227252) method and then calling the resulting [**StorageFileQueryResult**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR208046) object's [**GetFilesAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/br227276.aspx) method.

trans-unit.source: The **GetFilesAsync** method returns an [IReadOnlyList](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324970) collection of **StorageFile** objects.
trans-unit.target: The **GetFilesAsync** method returns an [IReadOnlyList](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=324970) collection of **StorageFile** objects.

trans-unit.source: Once you have the access to a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) object representing the desired file(s), the value of the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property reflects whether or not the file is available.
trans-unit.target: Once you have the access to a [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) object representing the desired file(s), the value of the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property reflects whether or not the file is available.

trans-unit.source: The following generic method illustrates how to enumerate any folder and return the collection of [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) objects for that folder.
trans-unit.target: The following generic method illustrates how to enumerate any folder and return the collection of [**StorageFile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR227171) objects for that folder.

trans-unit.source: The calling method then iterates over the returned collection referencing the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property for each file.
trans-unit.target: The calling method then iterates over the returned collection referencing the [**StorageFile.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property for each file.
